resources.string: About the SAP US Sailing Partnership

SAP is the Official Technology Partner of the United States Sailing Association SAP supports the United States Sailing Association through the implementation of a range of innovative technology solutions, delivering analytics to help teams and sailors improve whilst also providing systems to help sailing operations run more efficiently.
About the SAP Sailing Boat Tracker /SAP Sail InSight?

The SAP Sailing Boat Tracker /SAP Sail InSight provides sailors and teams with valuable information for post-race analysis. Users download the app on their smartphone and record GPS tracks whilst out on the water, calculating racing results and other valuable data.
